title: Mythicmobs里的orbital(环绕轨道)怎么用
author: 夜枫宸
txt_content: 如题 照抄wiki里的样板都显示不出该有的粒子效果

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
官例，你自己看看...
https://www.mythicmobs.net/manua ... s/mechanics/orbital

  Mob:
    Type: SKELETON
    Skills:
    - skill{s=IceShield} @self ~onDamaged 0.2复制代码
  IceShield:
    Skills:
    - orbital{onTick=IceShield-Tick;onHit=IceShield-Hit;points=20;interval=1;duration=200;charges=1}
  IceShield-Tick:
    Skills:
    - effect:particles{p=snowballpoof;amount=20;speed=0;hS=0.2;vS=0.2} @origin
  IceShield-Hit:
    Skills:
    - damage{a=10}
    - potion{type=SLOW;duration=100;lvl=2}复制代码
